none: media/user/SCRAPE/test/2016-10-shataan/extracted/Shataan/02 They Who Died For The Ghost Dance

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on October 23, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
This one got lost in my mental shuffle during the deluge of Black Twilight/Crepusculo Negro related releases during the first wave from 2009-11 or so. Thankfully, I hoard shit, so SHATAAN was waiting patiently for me last week, waiting to me to open myself to sounds of primitively reproduced and musically advanced discordant bleak metal. And I was opened. I certainly would put this in the same category as VOLAHN or GLOSSOLALIA, but there's something about the vocals and the howled desperation...it makes up for the almost casual delivery of these relatively complex tracks. Listen to the guitars, let the tracks sink in...it was worth the wait. WAR CRY LAMENT

seo.title: Shataan - Shataan demo 2011 - Terminal Escape
